title: Home
text:
1.1 Welcome
Welcome to my professional MBA portfolio. I am a certified dietitian with over ten years of experience managing multidisciplinary healthcare clinics and hospitals in Peru, with deep understang of human health and behaviour. Currently living in Canada, I am pursuing an MBA with a focus on strategy, innovation, and digital transformation, expanding my impact by learning how to scale sustainable wellness solution through business innnovation.
This portfolio showcases my academic journey, full educational background, professional experience, certifications and skills, and projects that reflect my leadership, adaptability, and business insight across cultures.

title: Home
text:
1.2 Mission
My mission is to integrate healthcare and nutrition with businesses through data-driven strategies and innovative tools to improve the quality of patient care, logistics operations, and service delivery. I believe in combining compassion with analytics to develop more people-focused solutions.

title: Projects & Case Studies
text:
The projects mentioned below demonstrate my ability to lead in the areas of health and healthcare, improve logistics operations, and integrate wellness with businesses in multicultural environments.



Role: Deli Expert, 2024â€“Present
Location: Fresh Street Market, North Vancouver, Canada
I introduced operational and communication skills within the department while completing my MBA.

I identified and improved food safety and hygiene workflows.
I supported onboarding and multicultural communication with new staff.





Role: Medical Center Manager CorpoSano, 2016â€“2023
Location: Private Healthcare Clinics, Peru
I contributed to the restructuring of the private clinicâ€™s operations to improve service quality by increasing the flow and utilization of both staff and patients/clients.

Adapted tools to reduce administrative overhead.
Increased customer satisfaction by:
Coordinated with departments within the clinic.





Role: Nutritionist, 2012â€“2015
Location: Volcan Mining, Peru
I redesigned of the nutrition system for mine workers.

Development of weekly or monthly nutritional plans based on health risk factors.
Creation of hygiene and food handling workshops for kitchen staff.





Course: BUSI 654 â€“ Application of AI in Business
Institution: University Canada West (2025)

Used Quarto to present a digital report

Brainstormed predictive models with LLM support
